name: Green Moon 2
description: This is a pure adventure game with tons of tasks to complete. There are around 400 locations in the game, 48 hours of gameplay, plus many unique mini-games, such as piloting a spaceship, shooting a bow in the Middle Ages, and fighting duels in the Wild West.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP/Win Vista/Win 7/Win 8/Win 10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 230 + DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1100 MB available space Sound Card: Support OpenAL
recommended_requirements: OS: Win XP/Win Vista/Win 7/Win 8/Win 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 330 + DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1100 MB available space Sound Card: Support OpenAL
